Articles.Content:
Out of commission

Edited April 20, 2013 by ALILOOOONG
Thanks for this thread, keep updating it once the mods are updated
This is something i seeking for few days. Very, very usefull thread. You can also add some questionare, but not necessary. I think this thread earn popularity fast.
Which MMI pack is this referencing? I am having tons of trouble with the Satellite pack...
Is this a list of all working mods regardless of version, or all mods that work with 1.7?

Is this a list of all working mods regardless of version, or all mods that work with 1.7?

Upping this question.

It would be great to make 0.17 only mod list

Upping this question.

It would be great to make 0.17 only mod list

Well I'm pretty sure that's what this is, a list of mods that work in 0.17
All these mods are advanced and the 0.17 compability is sure but we need wait.
I'd be very very thankfull if someone made similar list for plugins
Only issue with this thread is that it's not sticky!

I'd be very very thankfull if someone made similar list for plugins

I'm currently using .17 succesfully with the following plugins (All latest version ofcourse):

* Cart plugin

* ISA_Mapsat

* MMI Kethane

* Mechjeb

* Interplanetary Travel Calculator

* Demv

There are more plugins i think that will work on .17 but i am ignoring the Zoxygene and electrical power plugins for now because of the huge incompatebility between all them.
Zoxygene's EPS seems broken, Electrical Energy is fine.
Very useful thread, I would appreciate if you keep updating this. It would benefit alot of us, thanks!
Minor suggestion: Add a date of last update to each mod

Here's probably the most useful mod for Interplanetary travel that is fully compatible with .17 Click for Protrator Mod. I use most of the Mods listed in this thread, but this to me is probably one of the best (second only to Mechjeb)

@cruseaderuk, Earthpulse

Protractor Mod or Interplanetary Travel Calculator add something usefull what the MechaJeb doesn't have? I mean travel information and handy helps to plain travel to target. I use Mechajeb for orbital and landing informations.

I actually stopped using the Travel calculator and use mechjeb and protractor now. The protracter is THE tool for interplanatary travels.

Once you orbit kerbin the tool gives you enough information to get to jool with 1 burn f.i.

Solar panels in one plugin are broken, I don't remember from which they came. Those are the deployable ones.

Can you link me to cart plugin please? Can't find it.
Done on first post.

Very good thread indeed. An excellent idea would be to turn this into a public-viewable document usable through either PasteBin or Google Docs, that would hopefully ensure that this thread won't disappear and be maintained.
Since this includes plugins, would you mind putting up my Ferram Aerospace Research plugin?
This should be sticky. Thanks for this list. I'm always hunting the forums like crazy for the mod I was looking for. Thank you so much
the dms doesnt work
the Kreuzung's electrical enegy plugin doesnt work
The arrays should be able to fold up.
